/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling intersection in Beijing, China. The vantage point is from a high angle, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The intersection is teeming with cars and buses, indicating a busy time of day. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a sunny day. The buildings in the background are tall and modern, indicative of the city's architectural style. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of scale to the scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the blue of the sky contrasting with the various hues of the buildings and vehicles.
